item.description:
MAMA KICKS and we kick back, and we kick...well, anyway we have a good time...to a good ole' fashion rock and roll band :)

come early for dinner, put in your reply, so people will know who to look for :) as I'll miss dinner and won't make it until about 8-8:30 for introductions. If you get there early, grab some tables XXX

see you on the dance floor, but preferably before the band starts at 9-9:30ish, for intros.
suz
item.how_to_find_us: look for the loud bunch, with the meetup sign hiding on the table somewhere....

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Let's "whoop it up" at whips ;) with...
